actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to impose certain taxes on energy industries and create certain incentives for energy investment.

summary.text: Imposes an income tax surcharge under the Internal Revenue Code on every energy corporation for each taxable year ending after December 31, 1972, and beginning before the termination of the energy emergency period.

titles.title: A bill to impose certain taxes on energy industries and create certain incentives for energy investment.
